hero.altText: Cozy atmosphere of La Bodega de la Ferradura, mountain restaurant in Alp

services.sectionDescription: At La Bodega de la Ferradura, we celebrate the authentic flavors of mountain cuisine, with organic and local products.
services.pastaPizzas.title: Fresh Pasta & Artisan Pizzas
services.pastaPizzas.description: Enjoy our daily made fresh pasta and our artisan pizzas made with top quality ingredients.
services.quichesCrepes.title: Homemade Quiches & Crêpes
services.quichesCrepes.description: Delight in our varied quiches and sweet and savory crêpes, perfect for any time of day.
services.saladsVegan.title: Organic Salads & Vegan/Vegetarian Options
services.saladsVegan.description: We offer a selection of fresh salads with organic products, as well as vegetarian and vegan options for all tastes, including tender garlic omelette and tarte tatin.
aiSommelier.sectionDescription: Describe your preferences, and our AI Sommelier will suggest the ideal dishes from La Bodega de la Ferradura.
aiSommelier.cardDescription: Tell us your tastes: type of cuisine, favorite ingredients, whether you prefer meat, fish, vegetarian options...
aiSommelier.textareaPlaceholder: E.g., I like intense flavors, prefer red meat, looking for a full-bodied red wine...

aboutUs.title: ABOUT LA BODEGA DE LA FERRADURA
aboutUs.introduction: At {restaurantName}, we cook with passion, combining the best grill and traditional mountain cuisine with local products. Every dish is a celebration of the authentic flavors of Alp.
aboutUs.paragraph1: Our venue, with its cozy atmosphere and rustic decor featuring wood and stone accents, is ideal for enjoying a quiet meal with family or friends in La Cerdanya.
contactMap.sectionDescription: Visit us at {restaurantName} to enjoy a unique mountain gastronomic experience.
